title.title: BALI HORSE RIDING AND JATILUWIH TANAH LOT TOUR
title.text: BALI HORSE RIDING AND JATILUWIH TANAH LOT TOUR
title.html: BALI HORSE RIDING AND JATILUWIH TANAH LOT TOUR

tagline.title: BALI HORSE RIDING AND JATILUWIH TANAH LOT TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY HORSEBACK RIDING THROUGH WIDE AND BEAUTIFUL BEACH AND CONTINUE VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL JATILUWIH RICE TERRACE AND SEE SUNSET AT TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: BALI HORSE RIDING AND JATILUWIH TANAH LOT TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY HORSEBACK RIDING THROUGH WIDE AND BEAUTIFUL BEACH AND CONTINUE VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL JATILUWIH RICE TERRACE AND SEE SUNSET AT TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: BALI HORSE RIDING AND JATILUWIH TANAH LOT TOUR IS A COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO ENJOY HORSEBACK RIDING THROUGH WIDE AND BEAUTIFUL BEACH AND CONTINUE VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL JATILUWIH RICE TERRACE AND SEE SUNSET AT TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Combination Tour packages and interesting combination tours to enjoy adventure of horse back riding in beautiful beach and continue the tour to see the beautiful Jatiluwih rice terrace and see the amazing sunset at Tanah lot temple. This Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour package is great combination for spend day in Bali by doing horseback riding through beautiful beach with duration 1 hours 30 minutes ride, assits by professional horseback riding guide, then trip continue for enjoy lunch Indonesian food. After lunch finish trip continue to visit Jatiluwih rice terrace is the biggest rice terrace in Bali islands, in here you can do small trekking beside the rice paddy and take picture as many as you like, and then tour continue to visit Taman Ayun Temple is mother temple of mengwi village with beautiful view and ponds around the temple, the continue to visit last site in this combination tour is to visit Tanah Lot temple is Hindu temple located in sea, this temple is most visit temple by tourist for enjoy view of sunset, the sunset view in this temple is really fascinating. The Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour will bring you to the wonderful memory with a different experiences as the feature of this package. Our professional Tours Driver is always outstanding offer our best services to keep your convenience trip along with private full air-conditioning car transfer to complete your enjoyable on Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tour
description.html: Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Combination Tour packages and interesting combination tours to enjoy adventure of horse back riding in beautiful beach and continue the tour to see the beautiful Jatiluwih rice terrace and see the amazing sunset at Tanah lot temple. This Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour package is great combination for spend day in Bali by doing horseback riding through beautiful beach with duration 1 hours 30 minutes ride, assits by professional horseback riding guide, then trip continue for enjoy lunch Indonesian food. After lunch finish trip continue to visit Jatiluwih rice terrace is the biggest rice terrace in Bali islands, in here you can do small trekking beside the rice paddy and take picture as many as you like, and then tour continue to visit Taman Ayun Temple is mother temple of mengwi village with beautiful view and ponds around the temple, the continue to visit last site in this combination tour is to visit Tanah Lot temple is Hindu temple located in sea, this temple is most visit temple by tourist for enjoy view of sunset, the sunset view in this temple is really fascinating. The Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour will bring you to the wonderful memory with a different experiences as the feature of this package. Our professional Tours Driver is always outstanding offer our best services to keep your convenience trip along with private full air-conditioning car transfer to complete your enjoyable on Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tour

title.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour Packages | Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour Packages | Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Horse Riding packages we offer in this combination tour Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour packages is to enjoy riding a horse in beautiful beach with amazing view and professional horse riding guide during the adventure. It provides the exciting horse riding adventures by the best selection of tame and healthy horses to explore the beautiful beach with sea breeze blowing and covers the coastal area. The stables are set in the coastal side with tropical plantation surround it . Your horse riding trail will passed the local village and through the beautiful beach.
description.html: Bali Horse Riding packages we offer in this combination tour Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour packages is to enjoy riding a horse in beautiful beach with amazing view and professional horse riding guide during the adventure. It provides the exciting horse riding adventures by the best selection of tame and healthy horses to explore the beautiful beach with sea breeze blowing and covers the coastal area. The stables are set in the coastal side with tropical plantation surround it . Your horse riding trail will passed the local village and through the beautiful beach.

title.title: Jatiluwih Rice Terrace | Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour | Jatiluwih Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Jatiluwih is a name of country side located in the plateau area with the mountain as a backdrop. It owns very beautiful panorama of rice terrace unfolding from the foot of mountain to the sea, the cool atmospheres surround the area of Jatiluwih with the good water irrigation. Jatiluwih rice cultivation has an area of approximately 636 ha. And this Jatiluwih rice field located at an altitude of 700 meters above sea level. This area is a suitable place to visit for the one who missed the Mountain fresh air and the natural panorama as a place to soothe the mind, because of the beautiful place that is still natural with fresh air.

title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple is located in Mengwi District and about 45 minutes from Denpasar Town. Is mother temple of mengwi village, this temple is designed with Bali architecture, the form this temple building is also owns separate unique with up to 10 storeys . Taman Ayun Temple is built on the flat land with big fish pond surround it and it is looked like adrift on the water. Taman Ayun Temple is also considered to have historical values, which makes the regional government of Bali suggests the UNESCO in 2002 that this temple is included in World Heritage List.
description.html: Taman Ayun Temple is located in Mengwi District and about 45 minutes from Denpasar Town. Is mother temple of mengwi village, this temple is designed with Bali architecture, the form this temple building is also owns separate unique with up to 10 storeys . Taman Ayun Temple is built on the flat land with big fish pond surround it and it is looked like adrift on the water. Taman Ayun Temple is also considered to have historical values, which makes the regional government of Bali suggests the UNESCO in 2002 that this temple is included in World Heritage List.

title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple also one of the important temple for Balinese people located in Tabanan, Braban Village. This temple is most visited by tourist for enjoy the view of the beach and the temple. Tanah Lot Temple is a famous visitor and social symbol for photography and general exoticism, Beside see the temple, also you can visit the Holy Water located beneath of Tanah Lot Temple, if the water not so high you can visit this holy water place and if you want to have holy water, you can ask permission to the priest for have the holy water for good fortune.

price.title: Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tour Price : 

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,650,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,350,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,250,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,150,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,100,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking
  • Maksimun weight can ride the horse is 90 kg, over than that is not allowed to ride the horse

Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tour Price Include :

  • Private and Comfortable A/C Car
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • 1 Hours Horse Riding
  • Mineral Water
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Insurance Coverage during Horse Riding

itinerary.title: Bali Horse Riding and Jatiluwih Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy 1 Hours Bali Horse Riding Tour Packages
Visit Jatiluwih Rice Terrace
Visit Taman Ayun Temple
Visit Tanah Lot Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
